# Changelog

## v1.1.0 (2017-05-10)

### Added

- Added `extend` method

## v1.0.4 (2017-01-31)

### Changed
- Use `$app` instead of `$this->app` when register the Uploader to the Application

## v1.0.3 (2017-01-24)

### Changed
- Clean up code

## v1.0.2 (2016-12-15)

### Added
- Added the default file visibility

## v1.0.1 (2016-12-15)

### Added
- Added contract bindings

## v1.0.0 (2016-12-11)

### Added
- Initial Release
